Description: WOW! This is the best playing guitar, I've had in a LONG, LONG, time! MINT!! Perfectly set up with 9's. MINT! 2014 BFR Island Burst Luke with a solid Rosewood neck!The Ball family is the last of a dying breed, a family business making guitars and basses exclusively in the United States. Ball Family Reserve is a celebration of our heritage in instrument craftsmanship which features some of the finest figured tone woods and finishes available. These rare heritage pieces will be offered in limited runs and allow us to present instruments to the public that were previously reserved for family and our loyal artists.• Body Wood: Koa top - Mahogany body• Body Finish: High gloss polyester• Bridge: Koa top - Music Man vintage tremolo with gold plating• Scale Length: 25-1/2" (64.8 cm)• Neck Radius: 12" (30.5 cm)• Frets: 22 - Low profile, wide• Neck Width: 1-5/8" (41.3 mm) at nut, 2-3/16" (55.6 mm) at last fret• Neck Wood: Rosewood• Fingerboard: Rosewood• Fret Markers: Mother of Pearl dots• Neck Finish: Gunstock oil and hand-rubbed special wax blend• Tuning Machines: Schaller M6-IND locking• Truss Rod: Adjustable - no component or string removal• Neck Attachment: 5 bolts - perfect alignment with no shifting; Sculpted neck joint allows smooth access to higher frets; BFR Neck Plate• Electronic Shielding: Graphite acrylic resin coated body cavity and aluminum lined control cover• Controls: 25kohm volume and tone - .10µF tone capacitor• Switching: 5-way lever pickup selector• Pickups: HSS - 1 Active EMG model 85 humbucking; 2 Active EMG SLV custom single coil• JUST FOR FUN, THIS BE AN OLD SCHOOL, NO RESERVE AUCTION. The Fretboard Music Co. is dedicated to bringing you the finest vintage guitars and related equipment. On occasion, we dable in other realms of collectibles and Rolex watches, so you will never know what we'll have on auction. You'll see everything from player grade instruments to pristine high end vintage and everything in between. We are hard working people and strive to give honest evaluations and descriptions. Our goal is to make each and every purchase a pleasurable one. So bid with confidence..... EST. 1979! WE'VE SHIPPED HUNDREDS OF ITEMS WORLDWIDE! NOT OUR FIRST RODEO. WE HAVE A FABULOUS POSITIVE FEEDBACK RECORD AND INTEND TO KEEP IT THAT WAY! SO, NO WORRIES. PAYMENT IS DUE IMMEDIATELY AT THE CLOSE OF THE AUCTION OR ACCEPTED OFFER.
Title: MINT Ernie Ball Music Man Ball Family Reserve Luke Island Burst Rosewood Neck NR
